articles.content:
U.S. Forces Detain S. Korean Reporters 
    Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces detained three reporters of the south Korean KBS in Iraq on March 6, according to a south Korean KBS news report.
 When the south Korean side protested, they responded overbearingly, saying that if one understood the Iraqi situation, one would not think it was an excessive reaction and that the frontline soldiers treated them with utmost courtesy.    
  Reporting this, KBS said: "This shows an arrogant attitude of asking what was wrong, far from making an apology. This is a typical example that reveals the haughtiness and insane outrage of the U.S. forces thinking only their safety is of top priority and that makes us see why they are called occupation forces in Iraq".

Korean Foreign Minister Meets New Moroccan Ambassador
    Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Korean Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with Mohamed Cherti, new Moroccan ambassador to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, who paid a courtesy call on him today.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Congratulates His Nepalese Counterpart
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Sergei Viktorovich Ravrov on his appointment as Russian foreign minister.
 Expressing belief that the DPRK-Russia relations of friendship and cooperation, which have favorably developed on the basis of the special relations of the top leaders of the two countries, would grow stronger in the future, too, the message wished him good health and great success in the performance of his new duty.

Paek Nam Sun Congratulates His Nepalese Counterpart
    Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Bhekh Bahadur Thapa upon his appointment as Foreign Minister of the Kingdom of Nepal.
 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will as ever favorably develop in the future, the message wished him great success in his responsible work.
